meanings.definition: A person who is strict or uncompromising in their attitudes or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The hardnose teacher never allowed any excuses for late homework.
meanings.sent2: My boss is a hardnose when it comes to following company rules.
meanings.sent3: The hardnose librarian refused to let anyone talk in the library.
meanings.sent4: She was a hardnose when it came to enforcing the dress code at the office.
meanings.sent5: The hardnose coach pushed the team to their limits to achieve success.

meanings.definition: To act in a strict or uncompromising manner.
meanings.sent1: He tends to hardnose his employees when they make mistakes.
meanings.sent2: Don't hardnose me into making a decision before I'm ready.
meanings.sent3: She decided to hardnose her way through the difficult project.
meanings.sent4: The manager hardnosed negotiations to get the best deal for the company.
meanings.sent5: The chef hardnosed the kitchen staff to maintain high standards of cleanliness.
